participant_1.background:
My prized possession is my guitar, because it allows me to express my creativity and share my music with the world.
I've had to deal with a lot of loss in my life, but I'm still here.
My family is my everything.
i have bowled a 300 game twice in my life.
I balance my busy schedule by taking classes in the morning, working in the afternoon, and skiing in the evening.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a musician. I play the guitar, sing, and write songs. I'm also a bowler. I've bowled a 300 game twice in my life. What about you?
Hi! I'm a traveler. I like to explore new places and meet new people. I'm also a crafter. I love to create beautiful things with my hands. What's your favorite thing to do?

I love to play music, bowl, and travel. I also enjoy spending time with my family. I have to balance my busy schedule by taking classes in the morning, working in the afternoon, and skiing in the evening.
That sounds like a lot to juggle! I'm impressed that you can manage it all. I wish I could bowl a 300 game. My favorite movie is Pretty Woman. What's yours?
My favorite movie is The Shawshank Redemption. It's a great story about hope and redemption. I grew up in the country, so I'm comfortable in my boots. I also love my green tea set.
I love The Shawshank Redemption too! It's a classic. I'm not so sure about the boots, but I'm sure they're comfy. I've never had a green tea set. I'll have to look into that.
You should! They're really nice. I use mine to make tea every morning. It's a great way to start the day.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion. It sounds like you have a lot of great hobbies. I'm glad we met.
Me too! I'm always looking for new people to talk to. Let's connect on social media and stay in touch.
Sounds great! I'll send you a friend request.
